title: Send Email
description: Automatically sends an email to a specific address. This actor is useful for notifications and reporting. With only 3 lines of javascript code, you'll be on top of your scraping actors and never miss importing results or issues.

to.title: To
to.description: (required) Email address of the recipient(s), you can comma-separate multiple addresses.

cc.title: CC
cc.description: Email CC same format as to.

bcc.title: BCC
bcc.description: Email BCC same format as to.

text.title: Text
text.description: (required HTML or text) Text body of Email

html.title: HTML
html.description: (required HTML or text) HTML body of Email

replyTo.title: Reply to
replyTo.description: Email address which will be set when recipient will try to reply to mail. (Uses header Reply-To [see doc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5322#section-3.6.2))

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: array of attachments in base64 string
